details: Instantiated Local Editor UI task and outlined components/wizards to build
Bootstrapped Vite React client and core component structure
Implemented React components/hooks (TaskBoard, TaskDetail, editors) wired to backend
Ran npm --prefix src/ui run build to validate the production bundle and TypeScript project
Executed CLI-based manual verification script covering task creation, checklist toggle, log append, and contract/prompt editor saves
Ran npm run schema:lint after updating docs/local_editor_ui.md and verifying Markdown/schema compliance
Checklist closed with validation artifacts and manual verification notes recorded
